gurmukhi: inhPl ijhbw hY sbd suAwid hIn inhPl suriq n Anhd nwd hY
transliteration: Nihadhal Jihabaa Hai Sabad Suaadi Heena , Nihadhal Surati N Anahad Naad Hai ?

gurmukhi: inhPl diRsit n Awpw Awpu dyKIAiq inhPl suAws nhI bwsu prmwdu hY
transliteration: Nihadhal Drisati N Aapaa Aapu Daykheeati , Nihadhal Suaas Nahee Baasu Paramaadu Hai ?

gurmukhi: inhPl kr gur pwrs prs ibnu gurmuiK mwrg ibhUn pg bwid hY
transliteration: Nihadhal Kar Gur Paaras Paras Binu , Gurmukhi Maarag Bihoon Pag Baadi Hai ?

gurmukhi: gurmuiK AMg AMg pMg srbMg ilv diRsit suriq swD sMgiq pRswid hY ]199]
transliteration: Gurmukhi Ang Ang Pang Sarabang Liva , Drisati Surati Saadh Sangati Prasaadi Hai ?199?
